p: Sequencing data have been deposited at the European Nucleotide Archive (ENA, https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ena) under the accession ID PRJEB26933. Associated scripts are available from the git repository https://github.com/loalon/2020-spruce-drought-stress and the data can be interactively explored at http://terra.upsc.se/2020-spruce-drought-stress/.
